title: Sonyâ€™s LinkBuds TWS may launch soon with a quirky design
content:
Sony makes some of the best true wireless earbuds on the market. The WF-1000XM4, the company’s latest earbuds, has received critical acclaim for its outstanding ANC performance and amazing audio quality. Now the Japanese electronics giant is gearing up to launch a new pair of truly wireless earphones, dubbed the LinkBuds WF-L900. According to WinFuture,

The post Sony’s LinkBuds TWS may launch soon with a quirky design appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Sony is gearing up to launch a new pair of truly wireless earphones, dubbed the LinkBuds WF-L900, that looks nothing like we have seen before.
